description: [English version] Update 2020.12.09, full display of kubernetes resources! Including K8S overall resource overview, microservice resource details, Pod resource details and K8S network bandwidth, optimize the display of important indicators. https://github.com

matcher.options: (Memory Usage|Total Memory|Memory Request|Memory Limit|Disk Usage|Total Disk)

panels.description: The number of cluster nodes, the number of node POD, the upper limit of node POD
panels.title: Node and Pod
Summary of Microservices and Pod Resources
Pod container Memory Usage (node can be associated)
Microservice and Pod resource curve graph

targets.expr: sum (sum (rate (container_network_receive_bytes_total{origin_prometheus=~"$origin_prometheus",pod=~"$Pod",image!="",name=~"^k8s_.*",node=~"^$Node$",namespace=~"$NameSpace",pod=~".*$Container.*"}[2m])) by (pod)* on(pod)  group_right kube_pod_container_info) by(container) *8

sum (sum (rate (container_network_transmit_bytes_total{origin_prometheus=~"$origin_prometheus",pod=~"$Pod",image!="",name=~"^k8s_.*",node=~"^$Node$",namespace=~"$NameSpace",pod=~".*$Container.*"}[2m])) by (pod)* on(pod)  group_right kube_pod_container_info) by(container) *8

panels.title: Microservice (container name) network bandwidth per second (associated node and Pod)
